LanguageData.LetterLostBantee: A lost Bantee Metroid has wandered into the area. You can try to tame it, or you can leave it be, but betware; without a maturnal figure, it will not survive for long.
LanguageData.RT_TimeToMetamorphosis:
Time to next stage: {0} This creature is untameable
